breadcrumbs.name: 12-Piece Sojourn Melamine Set with Wicker Picnic Basket

featureValues.value:

  • Designed by Lawson-Fenning
  • Dinnerware: 80% melamine, 20% bamboo
  • Dinnerware: Dishwasher-safe, top rack
  • Basket: Rattan, cotton and metal rivets
  • Imported

products.name: 18" Channel Faux Fur Rust Pillow with Feather-Down Insert

featureValues.value:
dream sequence. The Dream Pillow was designed exclusively for CB2 in collaboration with Kravitz Design by Lenny Kravitz. Each piece is inspired by Lenny's eclectic global lifestyle and the furnishings from his homes in Paris, Brazil and the Bahamas. A collection that turns up the volume, the '70s-inspired designs capture the sleek glam of New York club culture and the natural ease of the California music scene. Dream imagines a '70s Op Art-inspired design grounded in an earthy palette and texture for a natural, laid-back vibe. Tonal greys shift perspective on 100% cotton, brightened by the rise and fall of an orange circle and white arc. The chunky weave creates a heathered, painterly effect on the organic front that flips to a luxe velvety grey cotton back. Kravitz Design observes "Even though it's a decorative pillow, it's like a small piece of art. People can look at the pattern and see different meanings, leaving it open to your imagination."

  • Designed exclusively for CB2 by Kravitz Design
  • Front: 100% cotton weave
  • Back: 100% cotton velvet in grey
  • Down-alternative insert: 100% polyester fill (Imported)
  • Feather-down insert: 95% white duck feather, 5% white down fill (made in Thailand)
  • Dry clean
  • Made in India

products.name: 18" Dream Pillow with Feather-Down Insert

breadcrumbs.name: 18" Natural Dyed Brown Pillow with Feather-Down Insert

featureValues.value:
No chemicals were used in the dyeing of this tonal brown linen pillow. Natural dyes are prepared with plants, flowers, roots and barks, including harda berries, then applied to linen fabric to create a Rothko-esque design. Flips to 100% cotton back. Because of the natural process, no two will be exactly alike. CB2 pillows include a pillow insert in your choice of feather-down or down alternative. CB2 exclusive.

  • Front: 100% linen
  • Back: 100% cotton
